description:
Hydrate and repair dry hair with Garnier Fructis Hair Food Treatment Banana.98% natural. 3-way hair mask. Its VEGAN* and contains vegetable oils.

Garnier Fructis Nourishing Banana Hair Food for dry hair deeply hydrates and repairs, for soft and healthy hair.Â  Use it as a hair mask, intense conditioner or leave-in treatment.

Enriched with Banana and no nasties;
NO parabens
NO silicones
NO artificial colourants.

Its VEGAN* and contains vegetable oils.

Use it 3 ways: as a mask, intense conditioner or leave-in treatment.
*vegan formula without animal origin or derived components

RESULT: Leaves hair feeling healthy and smooth with no weigh-down.

All Garnier products are officially approved by Cruelty Free International.
Since 1989, Garnier has been committed to a world without animal testing.

Multi-usage: intense conditioner, hair mask and leave-in treatment

Suitable for dry hair

98% natural origin formula

No silicone

No paraben

No artifical colourants

Vegan

Dermatologically tested
name: Garnier Fructis Hair Food Nourishing Banana 390mL
